title: Air-Fried Buffalo Chicken
ingredients: ½ cup plain fat-free Greek yogurt
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch strips
method: Step 1: Whisk Greek yogurt, egg substitute, and 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon hot sauce in a bowl.
Step 2: Mix panko bread crumbs, paprika, garlic pepper, and cayenne pepper in a separate bowl.
Step 3: Dip chicken strips into yogurt mixture; coat with panko bread crumb mixture.
Step 4: Arrange coated chicken strips in a single layer in an air fryer. Cook until evenly browned, about 8 minutes per side.
Step 5: Substitute egg whites for the egg substitute if preferred.
